website_summaries.verdict: Works to not only remove acne, but dark spots and other skin imperfections as well.
pros: One of the few cleansers that targets both acne and dark spots on your skin
Customers suggest it may take a few weeks to notice results, but they are worth it and sustainable without harming your skin
Engineered to combat excess oil and helps cleanse skin if you don't have acne as well
cons: There are reviews that suggest customers saw no change in their skin at all, however they may have not used the product long enough

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and hormonal acne
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY easily irritated skin. I use this every evening, then moisturize after shower and my skin is never irritated. It helps prevent pimples on my face and my back. I noticed when I ran out and didn't use it for a few weeks my skin broke out badly! I am in my late twenties, but still get pimples depending my my cycle. Also, one tube of this lasts me about 6 months. A little bit goes a long way. I used to buy this on Sokoglam, but they stopped selling it. Glad to find it here! This product is identical to the one I bought on Sokoglam.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Koerber

customer_reviews.title: Dried my face out
customer_reviews.text: I heard so many good things about this by some youtubers who really are into skin care, and it seems everyone loves CosRX products. I bought this to help reduce my pore size. I have tried many, many cleansers, most containing 2% salicylic acid we no problems at all. I can't find a reason as to why this dries my skin out so bad. I am using it once every other day, hoping that my skin will adjust to it, but right now, it feels like it is stripping my skin of all oils, which I would think would be great, sense my skin is so oily. First product ever to dry my skin out like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for two stars is because it does leave skin feeling squeaky clean . This did nothing to improve my skin and broke me out every other time I'd use it. No skin cleanser has ever done that. I purchased this to combat PMS pimples and help with the rest of the blemishes. I normally go weeks without having one, scho I know this wash was the culprit. I've been using since August 31, it is September 20th. I will not be repurchasing this cleanser, it was a big disappointment. For those who want to know, it smells like stale lemon cookies *Shrugs.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: This is working wonderfully on my teenage daughter's acne!  great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I read a review on her from another reviewer who stated she loved this stuff for her acne. My teenage daughter is going through hormonal changes and her face has been breaking out badly. This stuff has been working great! She uses it every other day and her face has totally cleared up. I started using this product as well and love the way it makes my face feels. Clean, not dried out, and free of blemishes. I would recommend this product to my family and friends as well! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Harris

customer_reviews.title: A Little Goes a Long Way!
customer_reviews.text: I use a pea-sized amount of this product nightly. Because it foams up, I can get away with using such a small amount while still covering my entire face. It has a pleasant tea tree oil scent. I can only use this product once daily because it's very drying when used in the day and at night. I have combination skin, so maybe those with oily skin can get away with it. Overall, I really like this product! It makes me feel clean and refreshed before proceeding with the rest of my skincare routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleanser for oily acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive acne prone skin and many cleansers are either too harsh and irritating, or not effective enough. This one is perfect. I use an exfoliant first and then this and my skin hasn't been clearer in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Leigh

customer_reviews.title: worst face wash ever DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst face wash I have ever used in my life. Do not use!!!! Other face washes that are not compatible with my skin would give me maybe one or two pimples. This one has given me the worst skin in my entire existence. Both sides of my cheek are with acne. I would use it, and feel the bumps but didn't think much of it. Then if you looked in the mirror, you literally see so much texture. This is either a knock off, or either just terrible. Please, save yourself $$$. Also, every few months it increases $2. This is a trap!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arun B

customer_reviews.title: I love all cosrx
customer_reviews.text: I love all cosrx products... and I have almost everyone of them! That being said this exfoliating scrub doesn't disappoint. It's great for exfoliating but gentle enough to use every day. I have oily skin and use this everyday in my Korean skincare routine without any problems. A little bit goes a long way And usually this lasts me a couple of months with everyday usuage. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Acne!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Simply wow. I been using other products to reduce my acne, but those haven't work too well for me. I have really bad acne when I'm menstruating or when I'm very stressed. The drug store over-the-counter acne treatment that I've tried haven't really work well or it does an okay job. However, those usually leave my skin drier than usual. But COSRX Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser works! And it doesn't dry out my skin! It burns a bit if it accidentally gets in your eye, but not severe. Other than that, I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: BlackRose

customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad because I really like cosrx and trust their products but this broke me out so bad and so quickly. I’ve been using the low ph morning cleanser for a long time along with a few other products and I was so close to getting clear skin for good but the second I put this on my face I broke out awfully. The reason it has two stars is because I feel like it would be good for people who still have BAD acne but too strong for people who’s face is clearing up, definitely not for sensitive skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that this product has really cleared up my skin or banished my acne like many claim, but it cleanses deeply and effectively. I like how it lathers up into a rich, creamy foam. Honestly, I do think it dries me out a little in the cooler winter/fall months, but it's nothing that aggravates me very much - I just layer on extra moisture. It comes in a generously sized tube that lasts especially long because I require only a pea-sized amount of product for my whole face. This is an okay cleanser all around, but I think I'll probably go back to the Good Morning Low pH cleanser when I've used this up fully.
customer_reviews.author: milla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face wash, a little drying, but is fine if moisturizer is used afterwards.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible face wash. I've struggled with acne my entire life, and all the harsh chemical washes teenage me stupidly used has left my skin uneven, scarred, and still acne spotted. I suffer from hormonal acne, white heads, and the occasional cystic acne, and with constant use of this stuff, twice a day, I've noticed a decrease in all of those. I also have very oily skin, and I've noticed, that combined with the COSRX birch moisturizer, the amount of oil on my face at the end of the day has drastically been reduced. I'm going through a really bad time right now with a breakout, but this wash is really helping it go away with no scarring!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Blaskie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very good foaming cleanser! Not something I would use both morning and night, but it's perfect for night time in my opinion. Salicylic acid can be really drying if you use it too much, so I stick to once a day and use the ph gel cleanser in the morning. Definitely very good cleanser though, and doesn't dry out my skin at all using once daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It has helped my skin so much. I have combination dry/oily skin. It really cleans off that oily feeling but not in a drying way while also clearing my acne. This is my favorite face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Tends to dry the skin and burn if left on too long.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try the double cleansing routine after my other face wash started breaking me out and causing me to be very oily. I have oily skin that is prone to breakouts for reference. I paired this with the Etude House cleansing oil, and I have definitely seen a difference in my skin. My only gripes with this product is that it can dry out your skin, it starts to sting/burn if left on the skin too long, and it burns when it gets into your eyes. This is the first foaming cleanser that I have tried and it was alright, but I think I will try something different next time and see if that works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Dreibelbis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial cleanser. I am in my 30s and have been cursed with adult acne. It isn't a miracle (hormonal acne is only cured by balanced hormones), but my acne flare ups are somewhat less. You only need a small amount, and it really emulsifies well. Lasts a long time. My face doesn't feel stripped at all, but still feels really clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KrislilyXO

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this wash daily paired with the pads and have seen a great difference! This face wash has a creamy texture ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the cosrx pimple pads to try and reduce breakouts I get on my forehead. I've been using this wash daily paired with the pads and have seen a great difference! This face wash has a creamy texture and lathers up very well. Also the tube is pretty big, so it will last definitely last while
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: OMG . . like a filter!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this cleanser once but was amazing. Just happened to be bathing with my hubby and we both washed our face with it. Both of us instantly noticed a difference. He said "I feel like it washed my ugly off". BTW he's not ugly in the slightest. Can't wait to use it more often and see how my skin does.
customer_reviews.author: danielle phippeny

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price point.
customer_reviews.text: Havent noticed a huge decrease in blackheads like I was hoping, but my acne has gone down significantly. I was using Bioré charcoal cleanser but wasnt happy with the cooling effect - it was very uncomfortable and not refreshing at all. This, however, does a very good job of taking my makeup off and not making my skin dehydrated. Light, medicinal, natural scent and wonderful foaming. A little does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: ... use this in combination with the Cosrx low ph good morning cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I use this in combination with the Cosrx low ph good morning cleanser. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a great acne face wash, but doesn't want their face feeling severely dry and stripped of its natural oils. Cosrx is an amazing brand and I've been using their products for months and have seen such a drastic improvement in my skin texture! It's helped calmed my cystic acne and now my face is the clearest it has been since my teenage years!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Caspillan

customer_reviews.title: Salicylic acid works well; lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I've used this cleanser every night (and sometimes during the day) for almost seven months now. This is the best foaming cleanser I've ever used, and with all the other products in my arsenal (used to combat oily skin and adult breakouts), my skin has never looked better. Barely any scent, rich texture, and lathers nicely. I've just purchased my second tube to have it waiting in the wings. I hope I'll never have to go without it!
customer_reviews.author: elizabethTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: So in love with it!
customer_reviews.text: I just adore this product so much!!! I have a sensitive combination skin and I've suffered from acne for the past four years. I tried so many different products on my face and neither of them stopped my breakouts. Luckily, I've got to know Cosrx face wash on Amazon and started using it couple weeks ago. To be honest, my face is completely cleared out of acne! This is the first very face wash ever worked on my skin to stop from breaking out! If you're suffering from acne and break outs like me, maybe this is your best chance to give it a shot. It's smells good, inexpensive and definitely does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Gowthamy

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cleanser and it has quite a reasonable price. It takes off my make up really well even without the double cleansing method. this lasts a long time and a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Wawa

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very oily skin and this product works wonder. The bottle is good size and price was decent too. My skin feels very cool and cleaned. Best ones I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Bad for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Cosrx makes me breakout. I have oily skin and it clogs my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure I like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure I like the smell, it’s not horrible but it’s not amazing either. You don’t need a lot to wash your face so one tube will last me a long time. And I will keep using it until it’s gone or I wanna try another product that amazon users are raving about.
customer_reviews.author: MeanieFilipinie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin dry and did not do anything about my break outs. I don’t think it’s gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Dzn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to cleanser which I've been using for the last 2 years. I'm in my early 30s but have oily, acne prone skin and occasionally get cystic acne along my jaw line. This product does a very good job of clearing away the regular acne and keeping my cystic acne under control.
customer_reviews.author: PkY

customer_reviews.title: Effective. Clear my acne withint a week of use ...
customer_reviews.text: Effective. Clear my acne withint a week of use. Definitely use a little and avoid eye area. It is acid afterall. I don’t think it is good for dry or sensitive skin. Do use lotion after washing with this cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Ani Chen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite cleanser! I noticed a difference in my skin as soon as I started using it. I even got my husband to start using it and this is the only thing he usually uses in his skin care and as soon as he started using it he started having a lot less breakouts and blackheads. And this stuff can last a long time too, ask you need is a small dot of product to cleanse your face.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin/not sure how to fee about it
customer_reviews.text: I have acne prone/sensitive/oily skin and I have no clue wether it’s working or not I’ve only had it for 3 days and my forehead has cleared up my skin feels clean and it’s non irritated and it’s helped my forehead clear up but.... I broke out on my cheeks,chin and sides of my face ...people say your skin gets worse before it gets better but 😬I’m not sure I would say get it but be prepared to mabey break out a little :)
customer_reviews.author: Nelena

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragranced!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge CosRx fan because of how great their products are for my sensitive skin, so I was really disappointed to find out that this face wash is heavily scented (although I should have checked the ingredients before ordering). Can't really speak to the effectiveness because I only used it once before giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely going into my holy grail of skincare...the packaging is really minimalist and cute, and it clears up my skin almost overnight!!! Really great for sensitive skin and oily skin too. I absolutely love the product. I decided to buy it on a whim because I'm really into korean skincare and I'm definitely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Akko

customer_reviews.title: Where is the tea tree smell I’m used to?!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product repeatedly for over a year, love it and it works well. I really love the strong tea tree oil smell. This last time I purchased 3 tubes and NONE of them smell like tea tree at all, they all smell like citrus which I can’t stand. I’d be returning but the seller won’t accept returns! Will be purchasing from someone else next time!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lazenby

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser for the proce
customer_reviews.text: Good for 2nd step in double cleansing. Keeps acne in control without over drying skin. Best korean cleanser for my skin (oily/acne prone) for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aniqa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son who has acne and he said it works! which is a lot coming from my 20 year old son who doesn't like to do much about his acne skin.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: First time using it i started breaking out thought it's just expelling out excess sebum but after 2 months of using it my skin has felt a little worse than normal I'm going to stop using it because I see no difference was having high hopes for it because i know tea tree oil is very good for acne but oh well don't waste your money just because it's Korean doesn't mean it's good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made me breakout
customer_reviews.text: I love their pimple patches and like to try different korean skincare. Unfortunately I found this one harsh and it felt like it stripped too much of my natural oils, I broke out from it and had to throw it out :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: love this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser works great - a little goes such a long way.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this...I've always had skin issues this is the 1st face wash that has actually helped improve my skin. Great price and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle MacB

customer_reviews.title: Not an everyday product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I personally cannot use this everyday. Great for those with oily complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: this was a good cleanser. I finished using the product
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin so during the summer i need something a little more stronger to clean my face and i also tend to breakout more . this was a good cleanser . I finished using the product , but i really didn't see that much of improvement with the breakouts .
customer_reviews.author: Kshine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic face wash for my oily and acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic face wash for my oily and acne prone skin! Really helped to reduce breakouts. Would not recommend to those with normal to dry skin as this product can be a bit drying.
customer_reviews.author: Peachee

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as other foam cleaners i've used. Left skin feeling oily and unclean.
customer_reviews.author: cuong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love CosRx and this is a great product. Inexpensive, effective, and gentle cleanser. Helps with acne and doesn’t irritate skin
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yates

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Noticed a immediate turn around in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Noticed a immediate turn around in my hormonal acne after one use. This is great as a every other day usage to keep acne at bay. Another great cosrx product.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: It lathers very well
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, nothing to write home about. Would not purchase again, it’s compared to drugstore washes. Nothing extreme or life changing.
customer_reviews.author: DC Huni

customer_reviews.title: Gave me painful pimples
customer_reviews.text: Within the 1st few days of using this product, I started getting pimples around my eyebrows, that were red and swollen. The pimples would hurt whenever I’d give them a little touch. I’m never buying this product again. By face was better off without it
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Kayo

customer_reviews.title: Great Evening Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great evening cleanser that leaves my face feeling much less oily, but not dried out.
customer_reviews.author: BDavis

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped. Dries out face and not gentle
customer_reviews.text: Overhyped. I have combo skin and this is not gentle at all in my opinion. Dries out the face and strips the face completely of oils. It leaves your face sqeaky and uncomfortable. I had to use another cleanser to get rid of the tightness.
customer_reviews.author: MSONG

customer_reviews.title: Cosrx is a great brand for quality skincare on a budget
customer_reviews.text: This is the gentlest exfoliating cleanser you can buy, while also getting something that will actually do what it promises. Cosrx is a great brand for quality skincare on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: amazing staff
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! You need just a little bit to have our skin clean and fresh. In a 10 days, my face looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Add it
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite cleanser for breakouts! I highly recommend it , it calms your acne and reduce redness !
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Cole

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Favorite daily wash, been using for almost a year now. It gets really foamy and feels so soft on the skin, and seems to melt away pimples. (that's a dramatic claim, but honestly, I love it.)
customer_reviews.author: Saaltlyfe

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out. I didn't realize that this product contained a coconut oil derivitive. It also leaves a film on the skin. Very bleh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping to clear up my adult acne
customer_reviews.text: Non drying. Clearing up my problem acne with a pleasant smell. I use it with a facial cleanser, rotating brush.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial cleanser. My face stays clean with it.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily-acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for oily-acne prone skin! I would only use it every other night as it does dry out your skin, other than that it's a great cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail Product
customer_reviews.text: By far THE best cleanser for acne I have ever tried. My teenager and I have hormonal acne. Her's is all over the face while mine is just in the jaw area and this product works like a dream for both of us. We saw huge improvements in just two days. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love the cleaner but they sent the wrong item with no returns
customer_reviews.text: As title said... love this cleanser but got the BHA skin returning essence instead, and I can’t return it or get money back.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmila Grigorieva

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. After so start lathering it turns into the rich, creamy, bouncy foam. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: i've been using this product close to 2 yrs now. this cleanser is great for oily skin, i use it in the morning and evening, always feel squeaky clean after wash which is followed with my skin care routine. downside is that it is not easily available in the uae :(
customer_reviews.author: stand faye

customer_reviews.title: I'm hoping to get better results within the following two months
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using it and I have noticed a small difference, it does dry my face a little but not to the point where it peels off. I'm hoping to get better results within the following two months.
customer_reviews.author: JessM

customer_reviews.title: but i feel like it strips the natural oils
customer_reviews.text: Actually cleans the skin, but i feel like it strips the natural oils, definitely moisturize after using this cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Angel L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Very gently
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very gently, does not sting or irritate. I was concerned the salicylic will be strong but not at all. My HG cleanser..
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Griffin

customer_reviews.title: works amazing
customer_reviews.text: i love it so much!! it’s a bit drying but it works without completely stripping your face and is very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser! Get everything off leaving my face super clean while not leaving it dried out. You only need a tiny but to form a great lather and washes off leaving no residue. I tend to use this one at night and the Good Morning Low pH cleanser in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it a whole lot but also haven't really notice a whole lot of results.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Steinbaecher

customer_reviews.title: I like this cleanser but I feel like it dries my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this cleanser but I feel like it dries my skin a little bit. But I really like it. I think I'll repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: It is ok.
customer_reviews.text: It is almost gone and since I’ve been using it, I’ve got only 2 new pimples (acne) and that’s it. I would say it works but doesn’t convince me 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great product. My face does not break out as much now.
customer_reviews.author: lanaKo

customer_reviews.title: good product for acne
customer_reviews.text: I have acne oily skin and this brand is working perfect for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I broke out so badly from using this. If you have acne prone sensitive skin DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Heather Halphen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very good! it heLped me Lessen the appearance of acne.
customer_reviews.author: FairyGodTeacher

customer_reviews.title: smells like lemon. would recommend for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: cleans my face well and doesn't dry my face out. smells like lemon. would recommend for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not good.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like tree tea oil. A lot. Works ok, nothing to write home about. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! My face feels super clean after washing. You only need a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: nice cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the skin pretty good. Does feel like it dried my skin a little.
customer_reviews.author: Ayushma

customer_reviews.title: Great, gentle cleanser that fights breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this product! It was very gentle, and had a nice refreshing sent. It cleared up my skin a lot and felt amazing on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean Face
customer_reviews.text: My acne has cleared up since I've been using this once a day!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I recieved mine on monday and today is Friday I can already see my dark spot going away. I'm loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lasts forever. You don't need much to get a lot of foam. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette Charles

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for oily acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second bottle. It has 5% Salicylic acid. High dosage than usually.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy López

customer_reviews.title: I heard good reviews about this cleanser and I was not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It cleared up my skin well but it was a little drying however that’s something moisturizer can fix. I heard good reviews about this cleanser and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great gentle cleanser , helps with red irritated bumps deep cleans small and large breakout areas also helps control oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little bit most definitely goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: this smooths my skin and helped my acne. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Cobian

customer_reviews.title: I love the switch from microbeads in a cleanser to this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the switch from microbeads in a cleanser to this chemical exfoliator. It smells like tea tree oil ( which is good ) and dissolves within a few seconds of applying it over the face. A little goes a long way and you get a lot of product for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Zan

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: The best foaming cleanser I've ever tried, it really helps and you can really feel the product doing its work. Super happy with my order, the seller even sent a free sample of a Mizon cream, it was a kind surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent but HURTING MY NASAL PASSAGES
customer_reviews.text: i'm just finding out glycerin is the first ingredient? for acneic skin??? anyway, i like how a little goes a long way and it seems to clear up my major stuff but my biggest issue is that it has been seriously irritating my nasal passages, just from the amount that gets rinsed off my face in the shower. my nose is scabbing, pussing, etc, and HURTS to the touch. be wary if you're very sensitive like me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: great depending on where you use it
customer_reviews.text: i gave this 4 stars because this works awesome in califronia and hawaii which both have high humidity rates, but then i moved to utah and this gave me terrible rashy like acne, not really cysts just huge bumpy rashes.
customer_reviews.author: ForTheLoveOfPugsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It has an odd smell and I thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: It has an odd smell and I thought it would have little grains in there since it's an exfoliant, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Already not cheating just after the 4o days return policy expired. Don't but this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This works just as described. It helped a lot with my acne and i would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is so gentle! I definitely see the effects in that it keeps my skin clear. The whole line of Cosrx products is great. I was surprised at how large the tube is. I took a photo comparing it to a tube of toothpaste and a St. Ives cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: which is always a bad sign. My skin got worse after I started ...
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser gets the job done with removing makeup, but it also completely strips my skin of ALL natural oils and totally throws off the pH balance. It's also HEAVILY scented, which is always a bad sign. My skin got worse after I started using it, but I always use products for at least 8 weeks before I decide they aren't working. I'm almost all the way through this tube and my skin has maintained the terrible breakouts, so I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser is great and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is great and does what it is supposed to do. I found through trial and error I can not use this daily, and I can only use my facial scrubber once a week with this. I do use this product a couple of times a week, never twice a day, and once on the weekend with my scrubber. It is a great for exfoliating, but with my skin, I have to limit my use. I would recommend this product, just use your own judgement on what your skin can tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: I. Love. This. Cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best cleansers I have every used. I use it after my oil cleanser and I can feel the salicylic acid actually working on my skin. it is so gentle and does not dry me out. my skin is also visibly clearer. I have combination/ congested skin and occasionally have fungal acne, but my skin have been 100% since I started using this!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Less effective and sickly smell
customer_reviews.text: ****REVIEW FOR REFORMULATION I used to absolutely LOVE this face wash, but the new formula is both a lot less effective and smells really off to me, it's a sort of sickly sweet smell that doesn't go away for a few minutes. I'm really sad they changed the formula and I don't plan to repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good acne wash
customer_reviews.text: No harsh scent, same level of acne ingredients and a great price. I have been using it for 6 months and not too harsh for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Heather G uillen

customer_reviews.title: Works for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: My teenage girls think that this is a holy grail in their skin care routine. I like it for my ageing acne prone skin too. Doesn't over dry like Neutrogena salicylic acid face wash. Gentle enough. Not a miracle worker, but good solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Rusana

product_meta.description: BHA cleanser eradicates difficult-to-remove dead skin cell and skin trouble;Volume : 150ml;Brand : COSRX;Made in Korea
